headline: Everest Appoints Christopher Kujawa as Executive Vice President and Chief Human Resources Officer
summary: HAMILTON, Bermuda, January 14, 2026--Everest Group, Ltd. (NYSE: EG), a global underwriting leader providing world-class reinsurance and specialty insurance solutions, announced today that Christopher Kujawa has been appointed Executive Vice President and Chief Human Resources Officer, effective January 20, 2026. Mr. Kujawa will report to Jim Williamson, President and CEO and will serve on Everest’s Executive Leadership Team.

headline: FPT Recognized in Everest Group Digital Transformation Services for Mid-market Enterprises PEAK Matrix® Assessment 2025
summary: HANOI, Vietnam, January 14, 2026--Global IT services provider FPT has been positioned as a Major Contender in the Everest Group Digital Transformation Services for Mid-market Enterprises PEAK Matrix® Assessment 2025.
